negotiation_templates.counter_low: Thanks for the offer, but {lane} typically pays around ${avg_rate}/mile. Your offer of ${offered_rate}/mile is {diff_percent}% below market. I can do it for ${counter_rate}.
negotiation_templates.counter_standard: I appreciate the load offer. Based on current rates for {lane}, I'm looking at ${counter_rate} (${ rate_per_mile }/mile). Can we meet there?
negotiation_templates.accept_conditional: I can take this at ${accepted_rate}, but I'll need {condition}.
negotiation_templates.walk_away: I'll have to pass on this one. {lane} doesn't make sense at ${offered_rate}. Let me know if you can get closer to ${min_rate}.
